mean_cn: adj.闷闷不乐的；郁郁寡欢的，悲哀的
mean_en: full of sadness or sorrow :very sad especially in an exaggerated or insincere way
sentence: That lugubrious man in the airport seems to have had a sad life so far.
sentence_trans: 就目前来看，机场这个闷闷不乐的男人好像过着悲惨的生活。
word_etyma: lug悲伤 ＋ ubr工作 ＋ ious...的 → lugubrious悲伤起作用
